html:
3.18.24  3:09 am   thoughts on the inevitable passage of time?

      yes, i express those thoughts frequently in my music and videos

3.18.24  1:37 am   which of your songs have had the most meaning behind them? 

      i don't know exactly how to measure meaning. if it's any good then it should break the metric system pretty easily

3.17.24  11:22 pm   whe you are outside does people ever recognize you and ask for fotos or something? 

      sometimes i ask them for photos. i collect photos

3.17.24  11:06 pm   hey bill wurtz,

can you draw a dragon?

     no

     i want to see your skills of an artist.

      you can check out my videos, there's a lot of stuff i drew in there. none of it's dragons. fortunately you don't have to draw dragons to be an artist. i already checked with the government

3.17.24  10:40 pm   Fill in the blanks.... If I [blank], then I will [blank]. 

      [fill in the first blank with this], [fill in the second blank with this]

3.17.24  9:21 pm   do you know how awesome you are? 

      i'm looking into figuring it out

3.17.24  8:06 pm   How come in 'perfect' the guy in the orange shirt says the only thing he can't do is go up and that he could do everything else when it is said earlier in the video he cannot predict past?

      it looks like that is a perfect example of a failure to predict the past

3.17.24  6:17 pm   How to silence the inner voice that always precisely comments on what I'm doing wrong? When i look in the mirror i always feel like i can see the biggest critic.

      make the art so bad that the critic won't even take you seriously anymore

3.17.24  6:02 pm   have ever done anything out of spite

      i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

3.17.24  5:38 pm   hey, bill. you gave me some advice a while back (12.27.23 9:05PM) and despite my doubts i actually quite enjoyed the idea. could you give me another unorthodox method of staying focused on my work? 

      not unless you are still struggling

3.17.24  5:03 pm   you have said that you select projects for production from a list of ideas/partially completed candidates. what does this list look like? is it a spreadsheet? a notebook of lined paper? is it in your thoughts?

      my standard method of list making is usually a rich text file, with the title of the item in bold, and a brief description (or other references) listed next to it in non-bold. the items are separated by line breaks

3.17.24  3:44 pm   where fo planets get their bigness

      gravity, i think

3.17.24  12:29 pm   what do you think

      you're doing great

3.17.24  12:15 pm   what will happen on February 17 2034 at approximately 2 pm

      i have no idea

3.17.24  10:27 am   what is the meaning of life?

      movement

3.17.24  9:21 am   When will you show us new songs? I search this page for answers but I no get them

      i'm going to do a huge amount of songs but first i have to do a bunch of videos

3.17.24  8:27 am   thoughts on dvorak?

      could be good, but i have no current interest in switching

3.17.24  8:03 am   does almost every question asked on this site eventually get answered?

      no

3.17.24  6:26 am   thoughts on anime

      too real

3.17.24  5:01 am   Can rabbits survive in boots

      almost

3.16.24  11:16 pm   if you were a huge liar what would you say your favorite ice cream flavor was

      olive

3.16.24  9:57 pm   are you a movie star

      no but i'm the next best thing

3.16.24  8:47 pm   What are the deeper meanings of your songs and videos, to specify,why do you come up with videos like "what is love" and "maybe I could eat blades of grass"

      for both of those two, the meaning is to start writing a video with no restriction on when or when-not to switch between music and non-music, and see what unfolds. while pursuing at each moment what i feel is the strongest possible content, at least to the best of my capability

3.16.24  8:37 pm   ive thought about the quote ""Don't try to be original, just try to be good" lately. i feel like all the good ideas have been taken, and everything i do is just a parody of someone else's good idea, especially whenever i try making music. have you ever had this problem, or has making your own style just something that arose naturally?

      if all the good ideas are taken, then why don't you just try a bad idea

3.16.24  8:34 pm   whats the capital of antarctica?!

      the south pole

3.16.24  8:20 pm   why do zombies want to eat brains as if it makes them smarter

      that's just a result of a vote. americans voted on which type of content they want to see. there were 2 choices, the other was of course for the zombies to drink brains

3.16.24  8:18 pm   what are you when you're not a huge gamer

      just a regular person, i assume

3.16.24  6:15 pm   What song is "how do i use geopolitical strategy to assert a subtle but lasting influence on other nations in time of uncertainty ?" from?

      that is not from a song, it's from a video, most likely part of the 'monday video' series, because it has no vocals on it

3.16.24  6:07 pm   Do you prefer to type "color" or "colour"?

      it depends on my mood, and the mood of the surrounding context

3.16.24  5:08 pm   what is awesome sauce made of

      you not knowing

3.16.24  4:50 pm   was the keyboard lick at 1:56 of might quit improvised or pre-written?

      that is certainly improvised

3.16.24  4:48 pm   why do you answer the strange questions we ask?

      i have never received a strange question

3.16.24  2:53 pm   why does art feel better in my head and worse when i actually make it

      because your imagination is too good

3.16.24  1:40 pm   They say where are you but never how are you.

     that's not true. what they do say, however, is something like that entire thing you just said

      How are you?

      pretty good

3.16.24  12:16 pm   how did you spend pi day?

      i don't know of a pi day

3.16.24  11:32 am   do you ever go somewhere but then wish you had gone wearing a really cool shirt?

      no, but sometimes the opposite happens

3.16.24  11:04 am   Can I give you a song recommendation?

      that depends whether you want me to listen to it

3.16.24  10:54 am   how often do you read books?

      not as often as i read things from places other than books, and also not as often as i recevve content and information audio-visually

3.16.24  10:43 am   Do a lot of people come on here just to state their own opinion instead of actually asking anything?

      yes, but that is not to say that that is the majority

3.16.24  8:54 am   whats your daily routine

      make the world a better place, but it's very important that i first check to see how good it already is, so as not to catastrophically over-do it

3.16.24  8:35 am   where so stars get their hugeness

      from the ... i don't recall

3.16.24  3:19 am   can i tell you something instead of asking something?

      you can try

3.16.24  2:24 am   What's a county you want to visit

      nederland, natuurlijk

3.16.24  1:38 am   I just got 2 of my wisdom teeth removed, and I got them back in a little container. Any suggestions for what to do with them?

      how about taking them for a walk

3.16.24  12:44 am   i asked this question 7.19.18  4:26 pm in 2018, which was taken from a history book, then some rando came around and asked it again recently, and i saw it. i rarely check this page. what are the odds

      zero. you are mis-remembering this. this is quoted from one of my videos. i composed that exact string of text for the video, deliberately slightly too verbose and/or satirically dystopian to be in an actual history book. it's not about history anyway, it would be about the present. geopolitical tips for those currently in power. However, the odds that you quoted it from my video, and then someone else would quote it from my video, are farily good -- quoting my videos is something that commonly occurs here because indeed those videos are directly connected to this website itself

3.16.24  12:00 am   would you rather have a talking duck that can get you out of bad situations or a cool pair of sunglasses that let you do space and time travel?

      is there a 3rd option, maybe a football,

3.15.24  11:42 pm   how does one introduce themselves to other people

      just appear

3.15.24  11:11 pm   I heard that scientists don't know why bicycles don't fall over when people ride them

      i think they do

3.15.24  10:53 pm   How often do you drink soup

      0 times per minute

3.15.24  9:39 pm   have you ever heard a good song from a video game

      of course, but it's worth noting that the context of the video game is usually entwined with this
